reg.title: British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority Pension Plan Regulation
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 416/2004, September 10, 2004]

section.sectiontext: British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority makes the British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority Pension Plan in Schedule A.

centertext.strong: British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority Pension Plan

lefttext.em: The British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority Pension Plan and its amendments are not included in this consolidation. To see the plan, apply to the office of the Senior Corporate Human Resources Advisor (Pensions), B.C. Hydro and Power Authority, 15th Floor, 333 Dunsmuir Street, Vancouver, B.C., V6B 5R3, telephone 604 623-4570.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 279/96.
content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Hydro and Power Authority Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 212, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sections 36 and 38]
